Package com.view

Interface View

All Known Subinterfaces:
ActiveView, PassiveView
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientSideView, CommandLineView, Graphical2DView, GraphicalTextView, GraphicView, ServerSideView, Views
public interface View
The interface View. Gives all the methods related to the view. A view is a way to interact with users.
